title: Wacky dreams once again
content:
Last night I saw some really strange dreams. There were more than these, but I can only remember two of them.

The first one was really strange. If I recall correct this is the first dream where is some other Keener(s) than me. Well, here we go:
In this dream I was sitting on some sofa or something on some quite big room. The room "continued", the place was really big, like library. There was a lot sunlight, plants and modern looking computers all over on some gray lite desks. They had those screens that are those LCD or whatever (those that are all the way sized like not-so-big painting). It looked a bit futuristic. There were other people too, and I'm sure it was some Keen community related thing, maybe some Keen fan meeting? But the crazy thing was that nobody was playing Keen. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]
Anyways, now what happened.. So, I was sitting there, and on a computer quite near there was LevelLord sitting. She looked very bored, and was using mouse very lazily. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] (This is weird, since I have only seen what she looks like in the Lindsey emotikeen [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lindsey.gif[/img] and some 32x32 picture that was in the first level of Shadow Keen 2 (in case it was LL).)
Then there was Ilsoap that came to say something, but I can't remember what. (Crazy that I don't know what he looks, either.)
So, because LL looked so bored, I suggested that if she wanted to play some 2-player game. Well, she couldn't hear since she was listening something (Ramms+ein I assume) loud on some headphones. You know when you for example walk on the street, and someone is listening loud on headphones, and you can still hear the music faintly? Well, that it was in this case.
So, I went near the computer, gestured that "may I write something" and wrote there to the nearest textbox (I think it was some browser's address bar): "Would you like to play some 2-player game?" Then she took the headphones and said someting "ok" (I can't remember the exact reply, I still remembered it ~1 hour ago).
Ok, then in the dream we played some game (which too bad wasn't Keen), which was really nice. It was a bit Wacky Wheels: In the game there was as a player that dog from movie Beethoven.
[url=http://www.moviegoods.com/movie_product.asp?master_movie_id=9275]www.moviegoods.com/movie_...ie_id=9275[/url]
The dog was driving a lawnmover (impressed by Wacky Wheels). The race was on a very cool track that was inspired from Crash Bandicoot games. The dog could even slide on some pipes or something the way you can in SSX snowboarding games. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] When I finished the first lap, this cool dream ended! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

The next dream there was something farmer and a cow. The farmer went to something barn and said something "Is the cow allright?" or something, and then the cow that was walking on two feet like humans, attacked the farmer. The cow was really werewolf-like; sharp teeth, furry etc.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]

So, very strange. This probably means that I must avoid LL or I'll be killed by a cow when I least expect it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img] We want Keen Chronicles!

title: KeenRush Dreams
content:
[hr]KR This probably means that I must avoid LL or I'll be killed by a cow when I least expect it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img]
[hr][img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v192/Jimage/rorielol.gif[/img]

Trippy dream indeed. That place sounds awesome. Strange that there was no Keening taking place...

I've never had a PCKB-related dream (at least, not that I remember). I've often wondered why that's the case, since I spend so much time here.

[hr]KR You know when you for example walk on the street, and someone is listening loud on headphones, and you can still hear the music faintly?
[hr]Heheh. People are constantly whinging about my tendency to do this during class.

I'm not adept at generic dream interpretation, so I guess my conclusion at the moment isn't much different from your rather amusing version above.

However, if it was me, I'd be wondering why:
- I was dreaming of a 'Keen fan meeting' where there's no Keening taking place and everyone's bored.
- the dream ended at the end of the first lap in a racing game.
- it was immediately followed up with a separate dream of a mutated Vorticon-like creature attacking a farmer.

>Commander SpleenCave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"Well, at least I can spel worth a damn."
- http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?BillZimmerly

JimSoft Lair
http://jimsoftlair.tripod.com/

title: Re: KeenRush Dreams
content:
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v192/Jimage/rorielol.gif[/img]

Lol! That's funny. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

[Your personal signature is too large and has been removed.]

title: Re: KeenRush Dreams
content:
Yeah, I wondered that too. But again, I said I'm not sure what it was, I just thought that maybe it was some Keen fan meeting (since there were Keeners) when I woke up. Not sure if I in the dream knew what it was, but at least I couldn't remember it when I woke up. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Anyways, agree, the place was really nice. But too bad, there wasn't even a single pixel of Keen anywhere. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

Edit: Also, to mention, LL looked bored, dunno about others, since there was loud and friendly chattering all over the place, like in some big cafe for example.We want Keen Chronicles!

title: Re: KeenRush Dreams
content:
That is SO weird. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]

I had a dream just two days ago when my diary [[url=http://www.thiswebsitewillchangeyourlife.com/blog/]www.thiswebsitewillchange....com/blog/[/url] ] told me to record my dreams:

I was sitting in some kind of computer lab, playing some kind of two player Keen against a Fleex [or possible Unfleexable] There was this one Keen 4 pyramid level, and every time I tried to move Fleex would type something and a block would appear, blocking my path. Finally he locked me inside a block and started dancing around to some forgein music. I got so angry I hit him through the floor and then it turned into that spleen thingy from french erotic film. Then I wnet and listened to my science teacher explain something involving exploding water.. Then I woke up.If no one gets whats going on- too bad!

UR A Frt Ltl Mrt Dsinhrt!

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/antiror.jpg[/img]
"No one should be here" -Level Lord

title: Re: KeenRush Dreams
content:
Wohoo1! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] That's one really strange dream!
To mention; I have seen Keen related dreams, quite many actually, and I've seen somekind of 2-player Keen game in one of them too.. Grrrg, nothing good happens in this reality. Goodbye! *falls asleep*

And about that Jonas Jansson Blog, I'm pretty confused. Is that your blog or some your friend? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] We want Keen Chronicles!

title: Re: KeenRush Dreams
content:
LL you should be a bit worried that KR is dreaming about you.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] -----------------
[img]http://members.lycos.nl/holydjaser/DJASER1.JPG[/img][img]http://members.lycos.nl/holydjaser/DJASERII.JPG[/img]
Back to spring 2002 when the crusade started...

title: Re: KeenRush Dreams
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oops.gif[/img]
No, I was dreaming about the dog actor of Beethoven and there just was LL involved.. (Does that sound strange? Good thing it doesn't!)

Seriously, good post Djaser, hopefully that finally scares her away. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] We want Keen Chronicles!

title: Re: KeenRush Dreams
content:
Are you sure that Taiwanese girl at school wasn't LL, KR? I wouldn't be surprised...

------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.

title: My heart..
content:
Garg, I hoped you all forgot that thing. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] Anyways, the reason I haven't said what happened (read: what she said that one day), is that I'm not sure what will happen (and the thing is _kinda_ embarrassing). So, wait some weeks, and I'll probably see what'll happen.. Don't make me tell that embarrassing thing, or well, it at least is that for me.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

And thanks for remainding me BBalazs, I've tried my best to keep the butterflies out of my stomach during the summer..We want Keen Chronicles!

title: Re: My heart..
content:
I was in your dream? Weird. You don't know what I looked like, and you don't remember what I said, but you still know I was there. Double weird.

Of course, I've had dreams about people I only know from online, and even when I did know what they look like, they still looked different in the dream (and I knew it was them).[url=http://www.screenhog.com]www.screenhog.com[/url]

title: Re: My heart..
content:
He probably saw you as a guy with a candle as head.-----------------
[img]http://members.lycos.nl/holydjaser/DJASER1.JPG[/img][img]http://members.lycos.nl/holydjaser/DJASERII.JPG[/img]
Back to spring 2002 when the crusade started...

title: Ilsoap
content:
"I was in your dream? Weird. You don't know what I looked like, and you don't remember what I said, but you still know I was there. Double weird."
Yes, in the dream you just was there and said something, and I thought "that's Ilsoap". Can't explain, it felt the same as you for example recognize some people you know; you just know them and don't think more about it. And in the dream I just knew that Ilsoap is there. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I've read your 'Il Soapbox' stuff (which is excellent IMKO), maybe I've picked up your look from there, though I can't remember what you looked like in the dream..We want Keen Chronicles!

title: Re: Candle head snuffs it.
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]LL you should be a bit worried that KR is dreaming about you.[hr][/quote]

LL: KeenRush, it has come to my attention that you have been dreaming about me.

KR: Uh, yeah, look, its not what you think.

LL: Well whatever it is, it disturbs me. I'd leave the PCKF, but I haven't found out where Djaser lives yet. As such, I am forced to resort to aversion therapy.

*strips*

KR: Aieeee! I'm blind! Oh god I'll never erase the foul images from my mind! Cyanide cyanide!

LL: I think that worked don't you?

MORAL: Don't sweat the petty things and don't pet the sweaty things.If no one gets whats going on- too bad!

UR A Frt Ltl Mrt Dsinhrt!

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/antiror.jpg[/img]
"No one should be here" -Level Lord

title: Re: Candle head snuffs it.
content:
So many people dream of others who they know from online, but I don't. Why always me?!


((I'm really sorry for that last one KeenRush, I just did not think about it twice.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ))

------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.

title: Re: Candle head snuffs it.
content:
^ No problem, it wasn't a bad feeling. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Anyways, I feel kinda bad for those jokes, so I apologize LL. I'm sorry, as in that dream we were only playing that Beethoven-dog game (no matter what Djaser says). Though, you of course know those were jokes.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-british.gif[/img] We want Keen Chronicles!

title: Re: Candle head snuffs it.
content:
Dream LL: OMG! Dream KeenRush!

Dream KR: Dream Levellord! Long time no see!

DLL: Hows KeenRush?

DKR: Okay I guess, judging by the frequency of strippers appearing in my nightly installment.

DLL: You thinking its time for another one?

DKR: Yep, I've got this one all sorted out, I got in touch with dream Ilsoap, and hes bringing the candles,

DLL: I'll bring my lingerie!

DKR: Yeah! That'll really mess with him! Do you still know Misty from pokemon?

DLL: Yup, I give her a call. I'm sure she can grab something from the hentai department.

DKR: Excellent. I love mind games!If no one gets whats going on- too bad!

UR A Frt Ltl Mrt Dsinhrt!

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/antiror.jpg[/img]
"No one should be here" -Level Lord

title: Re: Candle head snuffs it.
content:
I practically never dream about going on the PCKF, as I have other things occupying my mind.

I would tell you about my dreams, but they are generally either very weird, very racy, very scary, or any combination of the three.

I've had dreams where I play this RTS game where I command forces in the future, I've had dreams where I've had encounters with monsters and such, and since I am a 17 year old male who has no girlfriend, you can guess what some of my dreams are...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v452/Crion87/6b210175.jpg[/img]

content:
